Zydeco

After listening to way too much Buckwheat I came up with this. I use it for "Jambalaya".

  • Zydeco
  • ZydecoPlus
  • ZydecoSus
  • ZydecoSusPlus
  • ZydecoIntro
  • ZydecoEnd
  • ZydecoPlusEnd

Zydeco

Our basic cajan beat. (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord JazzGuitar
Drum-Kick KickDrum1
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1

ZydecoPlus

Adds a rhythmic accordion (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord JazzGuitar
Chord-Acc Accordion
Drum-Kick KickDrum1
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1

ZydecoSus

The orchestra in New Orleans? (4)
Bass FretlessBass
Chord JazzGuitar
Chord-Sus Strings
Drum-Kick KickDrum1
Drum-Snare SnareDrum1

ZydecoSusPlus

String and accordion? Too cool! (4)

ZydecoIntro

A simple, 4 bar, introduction with accordion. (4)
